articles.author: Jack Holmes
articles.title: 'We Really Botched Columbine': How the Media Has Erred on School Shootings
articles.description: For years, the media's adaptation to the era of mass murder failed to take into account its own role in this replicating American tragedy. That's beginning to change.
articles.content: When two teenagers walked into Columbine High School 20 years ago today and started shooting people, it just so happened that a large contingent of the national media had set up camp nearby. The nation’s cable networks and major newspapers were convened in De… [+12983 chars]

articles.title: A Small but Significant Fuel Tax Hike for Arkansas
